sentences.sContent: But, in most instances, people living in poverty respond to these societal ills with stoic resilience as they work to escape the degrading reality of their daily lives.
sentences.sContent_eng: But, in most instances, people living in poverty respond to these societal ills with stoic resilience as they work to escape the degrading reality of their daily lives.
sentences.sCn: 但是，在大多数情况下，生活贫穷的人们以坚忍的韧性来面对这些社会弊疾，努力逃避他们日常生活中有辱尊严的现实。

sentences.sContent: People of the Tohoku region are stoic, compassionate, calm and humble.
sentences.sContent_eng: People of the Tohoku region are stoic, compassionate, calm and humble.
sentences.sCn: 东北地区的人们坚忍顽强、平静怜悯、谦逊大度。

remMethod.val: 来自希腊哲学流派Stoic(斯多葛学派)， 主张坚忍克己

trans.tranOther: someone who does not show their emotions and does not complain when bad things happen to them
